title: 8 Of The Best Wellness Shots & Benefits | Holland & Barrett

cleaned_text: 02 Sep 2021 5 min min read Want to dip your toe into the world of wellness shots? Here are 8 of the best and why you may consider adding to your daily routine. A little different to the shots you are perhaps used to... wellness shots are small 'shot-able' drinks that are usually packed with natural ingredients that can support our health. Common ingredients include: Think of them as a quick and convenient way to get some goodness into your body - no kitchen or blender necessary! Each shot will have its own unique benefits, depending on what ingredients have been used. We've rounded up 8 of the best wellness shots available today, either in shops or using your very own kitchen. Even my friends and fam have noticed my skin has looked a lot better! :-)" You can't simply sip apple cider vinegar raw, as it could burn your mouth and throat, so why not make your own apple cider vinegar shot? This ACV shot serves 1, but can be modified to make in bulk. 1 Simply combine the juice and vinegar in a small jar or bottle and give it a good old shake. 2 Cover and leave in the fridge for up to 2-3 days. 3 Drink when you're ready! We already discussed the potential health benefits of a pre-packaged ginger shot above; a homemade one should be pretty much the same! Here's a recipe for a 1 lemon and ginger shot drink (adjust if you want to make multiple shots at the same time). 1 Peel the ginger and roughly chop before adding to your blender and blitzing for a few seconds. 2 Add in the rest of the ingredients and blend until smooth. 3 Cover and leave in the fridge for up to 2-3 days. 4 Drink your yummy lemon ginger shot when you're ready.
